title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 18.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 18.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Section
1224
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law authorizes the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles to
promulgate regulations prescribing such forms and procedures as are "necessary
or desirable" to effectuate the provisions of that section. Section 1224 sets
forth various categories of abandoned vehicles and generally provides for the
disposition of such vehicles by the local authority having custody thereof. Local authorities, as defined in the statute, are authorized to take custody of
any abandoned vehicle in their jurisdiction, whether abandoned on public or
private property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
18.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
